#   External documentation

## Ableton Surface Controller
- [Remote Scripts Blog](http://remotescripts.blogspot.com/2010/03/introduction-to-framework-classes.html)
- [Live Object Model](https://docs.cycling74.com/max5/refpages/m4l-ref/m4l_live_object_model.html)
- [Live Remote Scripts](https://github.com/gluon/AbletonLive10.1_MIDIRemoteScripts)
- [Remote Script Framework](https://structure-void.com/AbletonLiveRemoteScripts_Docs/_Framework/)
- [PythonLiveAPI](https://structure-void.com/PythonLiveAPI_documentation/Live10.1.19.xml)
- [Generic-Python-Remote-Script](https://github.com/j74/Generic-Python-Remote-Script)
- [PythonLiveAPI_documentation](https://structure-void.com/PythonLiveAPI_documentation/)
- [AbletonJS](https://github.com/leolabs/ableton-js)

##  MIDI sequencer
- [Tiny MIDI controller](https://blog.4dcu.be/diy/2021/05/20/MIDIpad.html)
- [TinyUSB](https://github.com/hathach/tinyusb/)
- [TinyUSB midi example](https://github.com/hathach/tinyusb/blob/master/src/class/midi/midi_device.h)
- [C/C++ SDK documentation](https://raspberrypi.github.io/pico-sdk-doxygen/)
- [SDK documentation](https://github.com/raspberrypi/pico-sdk)
- [SDK PDF manual](https://datasheets.raspberrypi.com/pico/raspberry-pi-pico-c-sdk.pdf)
- [Pico SDK examples](https://github.com/raspberrypi/pico-examples)
- [Pico stdio__usb](https://raspberrypi.github.io/pico-sdk-doxygen/group__pico__stdio__usb.html)
- [MIDI commands](https://computermusicresource.com/MIDI.Commands.html)
- [MIDI docs](https://www.recordingblogs.com/wiki/musical-instrument-digital-interface-midi)
- [Standford MIDI](https://ccrma.stanford.edu/~craig/articles/linuxmidi/misc/essenmidi.html)
- [MultiCore RAM share](https://forums.raspberrypi.com/viewtopic.php?t=321616)
